Directions: Press cookie dough into a greased 14-in. pizza pan.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes or until golden brown.  Cool on a wire rack.  Run a large flat spatula under crust to loosen from pan.

In a mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, peanut butter, brown sugar and milk until smooth.  Spread over the cooled crust.  In a bowl, combine the apples and soda; drain well.  Toss apples with cinnamon; arrange over cream cheese.  Drizzle with the caramel topping and sprinkle with pecans.  Cut into wedges.
Ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) package refrigerated sugar cookie dough
